text: Kristijan Lovrić (born 1 December 1995) is a Croatian professional footballer, currently playing as a winger for HNK Gorica. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ogulin Category:Croatian footballers Category:NK Bela Krajina players Category:NK Lokomotiva players Category:NK Lučko players Category:HNK Gorica players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Association football wingers
title: Kristijan Lovrić
